glsa.title: file: Denial of Service
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in file could allow a context-dependent attack to create a Denial of Service condition.

background.p: The file utility attempts to identify a fileâ€™s format by scanning binary data for patterns.

description.p: An issue with the ELF parser used by the file utility can cause a resource consumption when reading a specially-crafted ELF binary.

impact.p: A context-dependent attacker may be able to cause Denial of Service.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All file users should upgrade to the latest version:
